title: One BED is September Move-in Ready!
neighborhood: 1525 E Palm Valley Blvd Round Rock, TX
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Come and enjoy the quiet and relaxed living of The Creek nestled in Round Rock, Texas.
Upon entering our serene community you will wind through a rich forest of trees and cross over a tranquil stream before arriving at our grand clubhouse - the epitome of elegant creek-side living!

Our one and two bedroom homes come well appointed with a wood-burning fireplace, spacious closets for extra storage, private patios or balconies to take in the fresh air, and custom two-tone paint throughout.
In addition to this peaceful lifestyle, you will be able to take advantage of the abundance of property amenities.
The Creek has two refreshing pools to choose from on those hot days, an updated fitness center, and a beautiful clubhouse with a business center to pass your time.
When you want to venture out of your wooded escape Highway 79 and IH-35 are in close proximity making travel and commutes to work a breeze.
The community is also easy access to shopping and dining in the greater Austin, Texas area.
We are located less than a mile from Old Round Rock, which is so unique!
Main Street is right around the corner, which is the center of the city with old buildings, cozy coffee shops, an art gallery, and live entertainment!
We are located less than 5 miles from The Round Rock Premium Outlet Mall!
The Creek was even awarded the prestigious Austin Apartment Association's 2011 Property of the Year Award.
Stop by today and see why The Creek is the perfect place to call home!

Pet FriendlyMax 2 allowed  Max weight 50lb each  Deposit $250.00Comments: plus a non-refundable fee of $250.Pet rent $25 up to 25lbs and $45 up to 50lbsRestrictions: Breed restrictions apply; please contact the office with any questions.
